title: HUGE 2 Bed! Steps from Tufts and Davis Sq! HEAT AND HW INCLUDED!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 298486300', 'Rent: $3,200 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'This centrally located 2 bed is a must see!', 'This two-bedroom offering has a huge living room and two equally sized bedrooms with a great amount of closet space.', "Located in the perfect Somerville location, super close to Tuft's University, Davis Square, and Ball Square!", '-Spacious floorplan', '-Excellent location', '-Close to the Red Line', '-Rent includes heat and hot water', '-Laundry in the building!', '-No security deposit!', 'The information in this listing may have been gathered from third party sources including the owner and public records.', 'Listings are subject to errors and omissions.', 'Encore Realty disclaims any and all representations or warranties as to the accuracy of this information.', 'Encore Realty is an Equal Housing Opportunity Agency.', 'Photos may not always be of the actual apartment, at times sample images are used to make a general representation.']
